IDEAS LAB

SEE THROUGH YOUR CHILD’S EYES -HOW TO HANDLE WORRIES

11 February 2020 2.00 pm - 4.45 pm

This specialist interactive session invites parents to listen and share ideas on handling their children’s worries as they grow up in a demanding world.

Led by children’s author, poet and teacher Liam Kelly, this supportive workshop will help parents identify early signs of anxiety in their children and take steps to help them process it.
